title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - December 31, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - December 31, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary get together one last time in 2021 to review the news from the Holiday season including the verdict handed down in the case of Ghislaine Maxwell.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
